headline.main: What Does the New Law Mean for Freelance Workers?

docs.abstract: I'm curious about what I, as a student with university health insurance, will face, thanks to the bill, once I complete my studies. I imagine myself, at least initially upon graduation, as a freelance writer without insurance.
docs.snippet: I'm curious about what I, as a student with university health insurance, will face, thanks to the bill, once I complete my studies. I imagine myself, at least initially upon graduation, as a freelance writer without insurance.

headline.main: Where Can I Find More Information Specific to Me?

docs.abstract: I currently have an individual plan that I do not like and can hardly afford. Are there any changes in the reform that will benefit me, and who can tell me about them?
docs.snippet: I currently have an individual plan that I do not like and can hardly afford. Are there any changes in the reform that will benefit me, and who can tell me about them?

headline.main: Will the Health Care Legislation Prevent Rate Hikes?

docs.abstract: Is there anything to limit the insurance companies from extreme rate hikes on individually bought policies, particularly in the immediate future?
docs.snippet: Is there anything to limit the insurance companies from extreme rate hikes on individually bought policies, particularly in the immediate future?

headline.main: What About People Who Already Have Insurance?

docs.abstract: Insurance companies will not be able to rescind policies once someone becomes ill, nor can they impose lifetime limits on coverage.
docs.snippet: Insurance companies will not be able to rescind policies once someone becomes ill, nor can they impose lifetime limits on coverage.

headline.main: How Will the Bill Help Early Retirees?

docs.abstract: The legislation will create a temporary high-risk insurance pool for people with pre-existing medical conditions, but other subsidized coverage will not be available until 2014.
docs.snippet: The legislation will create a temporary high-risk insurance pool for people with pre-existing medical conditions, but other subsidized coverage will not be available until 2014.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate campaign of Alexi Giannoulias is being forced to deal with the probable collapse of his family’s bank on April 24.

docs.lead_paragraph: Since the start of the recession, the number of Americans receiving benefits under the main federal-state welfare program has increased less than 10 percent, even as unemployment has nearly doubled.
